Boom Boom.card_desc: [Weapon] Detonating a Magic Mark damages all enemies within 15 units of the victim.

Boop.card_desc: [Scamper] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after using Scamper.

Cozy.card_desc: [Magic Barrier] Heal for {scale=40|40} every 1s while Magic Barrier is active.

Dense Woods.card_desc: [Familiar Spit] Increase the duration of your Magic Marks by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Glimmer.card_desc: [Magic Barrier] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after being hit while Magic Barrier is active.

Greater Good.card_desc: [Familiar Spit] Gain {scale=8|8}% Lifesteal against enemies with the maximum number of Magic Marks.

Harmonious.card_desc: [Magic Barrier] Being hit while your Magic Barrier is active Heals you for {scale=100|100}.

Morning Breath.card_desc: [Familiar Spit] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=4|4}% for 2s after applying a Magic Mark to an unmarked enemy.

Nature's Blessing.card_desc: [Familiar Spit] Generate {scale=0.2|0.2}% Ultimate charge for each unmarked enemy to which you apply a Magic Mark.

Peppy.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Scoot.card_desc: [Scamper] Reduce the Cooldown of Scamper by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Scurry.card_desc: [Scamper] Heal for {scale=100|100} over the duration of Scamper.

Shimmering.card_desc: [Magic Barrier] Reduce the Cooldown of Magic Barrier by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Snack Attack.card_desc: [Armor] Players you kill leave Health Drops on the ground that Heal you for 800 when picked up.

Symbiotic.card_desc: [Armor] Increase the Healing you receive by {scale=10|10}% while at or below 50% Health.

Toot.card_desc: [Scamper] Using Scamper creates a cloud for 3s that Heals allies within for 600 over 3s.

Will-o-the-Wisp.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after getting a Killing Blow.

Wobbles.card_desc: [Scamper] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=6|6}% while using Scamper.

Allgemeinwohl.card_desc: [Spucken] Gewährt gegen Gegner mit der maximalen Anzahl magischer Markierungen {scale=8|8}% Lebensraub.

Behaglich.card_desc: [Magische Barriere] Während Magische Barriere aktiv ist, wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=40|40} LP geheilt.

Bopp.card_desc: [Flitzen] Nach Verwendung von Flitzen erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Bumm Bumm.card_desc: [Waffe] Detoniert eine magische Markierung, wird allen Gegnern Schaden zugefügt, die sich maximal 15 Einheiten vom Opfer entfernt befinden.

Dichter Wald.card_desc: [Spucken] Erhöht die dauer Magischer Markierungen um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Flauschig.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Fressattacke.card_desc: [Rüstung] Von dir getötete Gegner hinterlassen ein Objekt, das dich um 800 LP heilt, wenn du es aufsammelst.

Glimmer.card_desc: [Magische Barriere] Wirst du getroffen, während Magische Barriere aktiv ist, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Harmonisch.card_desc: [Magische Barriere] Wirst du getroffen, während Magische Barriere aktiv ist, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Irrlicht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Todesstöße erhöhen dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Mundgeruch.card_desc: [Spucken] Markierst du einen unmarkierten Gegner mit Magische Markierung, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=4|4}%.

Peppig.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Schimmernd.card_desc: [Magische Barriere] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Magische Barriere um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Segnung der Natur.card_desc: [Spucken] Einen unmarkierten Gegner zu markieren, lädt deine Überkraft um {scale=0.2|0.2}% auf.

Symbiose.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=10|10}% erhöhte Heilung.

Tuut.card_desc: [Flitzen] Flitzen hinterlässt für 3s eine Wolke, die Verbündeten 600 LP Heilung über 3s gewährt.

Wackeln.card_desc: [Flitzen] Während Flitzen wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Wetzen.card_desc: [Flitzen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Flitzen um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Wuselig.card_desc: [Flitzen] Während Flitzen wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Bip bop.card_desc: [Cavalcade] Votre vitesse de déplacement augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s après Cavalcade.

Boum-boum.card_desc: [Arme] L'explosion d'une Marque magique inflige des dégâts à tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 15 unités de la cible.

Brinquebalant.card_desc: [Cavalcade] Vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins pendant Cavalcade.

Don de la nature.card_desc: [Crachat du familier] Vous gagnez {scale=0.2|0.2}% de charge d'ultime quand vous appliquez une première Marque magique à un ennemi.

Douillet.card_desc: [Barrière magique] Vous récupérez {scale=40|40} PV/s pendant Barrière magique.

Entrain.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Feu follet.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s.

For\u00eat dense.card_desc: [Crachat du familier] Vos Marques magiques durent {scale=0.8|0.8}s de plus.

Fringale.card_desc: [Armure] Vos victimes laissent derrière elles un paquet qui vous rend 800 PV quand vous le récupérez.

Harmonieux.card_desc: [Barrière magique] Quand Barrière magique est active, vous récupérez {scale=100|100} PV dès que vous êtes touchée.

H\u00e2te.card_desc: [Cavalcade] Vous regagnez progressivement {scale=100|100} PV pendant Cavalcade.

Inspiration matinale.card_desc: [Crachat du familier] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=4|4}% pendant 2s quand vous appliquez une première Marque magique à un ennemi.

Int\u00e9r\u00eat g\u00e9n\u00e9ral.card_desc: [Crachat du familier] Vous avez {scale=8|8}% de drain de vie contre les ennemis affectés par le maximum de Marques magiques.

Miroitement.card_desc: [Barrière magique] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s quand un ennemi vous touche pendant Barrière magique.

Pouf.card_desc: [Cavalcade] Cavalcade relâche un nuage de 3s qui redonne 600 PV en 3s aux alliés qui le traversent.

Scintillant.card_desc: [Barrière magique] Barrière magique se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Symbiose.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=10|10}% de soins en plus.

\u4eae\u95ea\u95ea.card_desc: 激活屏障时受到攻击会提升{scale=8|8}%移动速度，持续2秒

\u5171\u6816.card_desc: 当生命值低于50%时，获得的治疗效果提高{scale=10|10}%

\u548c\u8c10\u4e4b\u97f3.card_desc: 激活屏障时受到攻击会回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u5bc6\u6797.card_desc: 魔法印记持续时间提高{scale=0.8|0.8}秒

\u5c0f\u5fc3\u86c0\u7259.card_desc: 被你杀死的敌人会掉落零食，被拾取时会回复自身800点生命

\u5fae\u6ce2\u7cbc\u7cbc.card_desc: 减少屏障的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u65e0\u5dee\u522b\u4e71\u8f70.card_desc: 引爆魔法印记时，目标附近15码内的所有敌人都会受到伤害

\u6668\u606f.card_desc: 引爆敌人身上的魔法印记将会减少其治疗效果{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u6696\u6d0b\u6d0b.card_desc: 屏障持续时间内，每秒回复{scale=40|40}点生命

\u66b4\u8d70.card_desc: 减少跑跑的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u6d3b\u529b\u5145\u6c9b.card_desc: 参与击败会减少所有技能{scale=10|10}%的冷却时间

\u75be\u8dd1.card_desc: 冲刺期间回复{scale=100|100} 点生命值

\u81ea\u7136\u7684\u795d\u798f.card_desc: 对身上未有印记的敌人叠加魔法印记会增加大招充能{scale=0.2|0.2}%

\u8d2a\u5a6a.card_desc: 攻击已经叠满魔法印记的敌人时会获得{scale=8|8}%生命偷取

\u8e66\u8e66\u8df3\u8df3.card_desc: 冲刺时会在身后留下一片持续6秒的“尾气”，队友进入此区域时会增加30%移动速度，并且3秒内回复600点生命

\u8f7b\u8f7b\u4e00\u78b0.card_desc: 使用跑跑后3秒内的首次攻击会使敌人显形{scale=1|1}秒

\u98a4\u98a4\u5dcd\u5dcd.card_desc: 冲刺期间获得{scale=6|6}%伤害减免

\u9b3c\u706b.card_desc: 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

Aliento Ma\u00f1anero.card_desc: [Escupitajo familiar] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=4|4}% durante 2s al aplicar marcas mágicas a un enemigo sin marcar.

Armoniosa.card_desc: [Barrera Mágica] Si te golpean mientras Barrera mágica está activa, te cura {scale=100|100} PS.

Ataque aperitivo.card_desc: [Armadura] Los jugadores que mates dejan un objeto en el suelo que te cura 800 PS al tomarlo.

Bamboleo.card_desc: [Correteo] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=6|6}% mientras usas Correteo.

Bendici\u00f3n de la Naturaleza.card_desc: [Escupitajo familiar] Recargas tu habilidad definitiva un {scale=0.2|0.2}% por cada enemigo sin marcar al que consigues aplicar una marca mágica.

Bosques densos.card_desc: [Escupitajo familiar] La duración de tus marcas mágicas aumenta en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Calientito.card_desc: [Barrera Mágica] Te curas {scale=40|40} PS cada 1s mientras Barrera mágica esté activa.

Centelleo.card_desc: [Barrera Mágica] Se reduce la recarga de Barrera mágica en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Deprisa.card_desc: [Correteo] Se reduce la recarga de Correteo en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Destello.card_desc: [Barrera Mágica] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s si te golpean mientras Barrera mágica está activa.

Din\u00e1mico.card_desc: [Armadura] Tus recargas activas se reducen un {scale=10|10}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

El Bien Mayor.card_desc: [Escupitajo familiar] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de robo de vida contra enemigos con el número máximo de marcas mágicas.

Flato.card_desc: [Correteo] Al usar Correteo, generas una nube durante 3s que cura 600 PS durante 3s a los aliados que estén dentro de ella.

Fuego fatuo.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Mullido.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Pum pum.card_desc: [Arma] Detonar una marca mágica inflige daño a todos los enemigos que estén a una distancia de 15 unidades de la víctima.

Simbi\u00f3tico.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación recibida aumenta un {scale=10|10}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Toque.card_desc: [Correteo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras usar Correteo.

Abracadabra.card_desc: [Desabalada Carreira] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar Desabalada Carreira.

Alto Astral.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% os intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Ataque ao Petisco.card_desc: [Armadura] Os jogadores que você mata deixam no chão um pacote que cura você em 800 de vida quando você o pega.

Bem Maior.card_desc: [Cuspida do Mascote] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de roubo de vida contra inimigos que tenham o número máximo de Marcas Mágicas.

B\u00ean\u00e7\u00e3o da Natureza.card_desc: [Cuspida do Mascote] Carrega {scale=0.2|0.2}% da suprema para cada inimigo ainda sem a Marca que você aplique a Marca Mágica.

Cintilante.card_desc: [Barreira Mágica] Reduz o intervalo da Barreira Mágica em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Confort\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Barreira Mágica] Você se cura em {scale=40|40} de vida a cada 1s enquanto a Barreira Mágica está ativa.

Debandada.card_desc: [Desabalada Carreira] Reduz o intervalo de Desabalada Carreira em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Estouro.card_desc: [Arma] Detonar uma Marca Mágica causa dano a todos os inimigos dentro de 15 unidades da vítima.

Fofinho.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Fogo F\u00e1tuo.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s após dar o disparo fatal.

Frescor Matinal.card_desc: [Cuspida do Mascote] Aumenta em {scale=4|4}% a velocidade de movimento por 2s após aplicar uma Marca Mágica em inimigos ainda sem a Marca.

Gingado.card_desc: [Desabalada Carreira] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=6|6}% enquanto está em Desabalada Carreira.

Harmonioso.card_desc: [Barreira Mágica] Ser atingida enquanto sua Barreira Mágica estiver ativa cura você em {scale=100|100}.

Luminoso.card_desc: [Barreira Mágica] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s após ser atingido enquanto sua Barreira Mágica estiver ativa.

Mais g\u00e1s.card_desc: [Desabalada Carreira] Usar Desabalada Carreira cria uma nuvem que dura 3s e cura os aliados dentro dela em 600 de vida durante esses 3s.

Mata Densa.card_desc: [Cuspida do Mascote] Aumenta a duração das suas Marcas Mágicas em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Passo Apressado.card_desc: [Desabalada Carreira] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} pela duranção da Desabalada Carreira.

Simbi\u00f3tico.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a que cura que você recebe enquanto estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

\u0410\u0442\u0430\u043a\u0430 \u043b\u0.card_desc: [Броня] На месте убитых врагов остается предмет, забрав который, вы исцелитесь на 800 ед.

\u0411\u0438\u043f.card_desc: [Пробежка] Ваша скорость передвижения после использования Пробежки повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0411\u043b\u0430\u0433\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Плевок друга] За каждого врага, впервые получившего Волшебную метку, вы получаете {scale=0.2|0.2}% заряда суперудара.

\u0411\u043b\u0443\u0436\u0434\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с. после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0411\u0443\u043c.card_desc: [Оружие] Волшебная метка взрывается, нанося урон всем врагам в радиусе 15 ед. от цели.

\u0412\u0441\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Плевок друга] Вы получаете {scale=8|8}% вампиризма против врагов с максимальным количеством Волшебных меток.

\u0413\u0430\u0440\u043c\u043e\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Волшебный барьер] Пока действует Волшебный барьер, при получении урона вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u0413\u0443\u0434\u043e\u043a.card_desc: [Пробежка] Использование Пробежки создает облако, которое исцеляет всех находящихся в нем союзников на 600 ед. в течение 3 с.

\u0416\u0438\u0432\u043e\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041a\u043e\u043b\u0435\u0431\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Пробежка] Пока действует Пробежка, вы получаете на {scale=6|6}% меньше урона.

\u041b\u0435\u0441\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Плевок друга] Длительность существования Волшебных меток увеличивается на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u041c\u0435\u0440\u0446\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Волшебный барьер] Перезарядка Волшебного барьера сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Волшебный барьер] Пока действует Волшебный барьер, при получении урона ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u041f\u0443\u0448\u043e\u043a.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u0438\u043c\u0431\u0438\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=10|10}% больше исцеления.

\u0421\u0443\u0435\u0442\u0430.card_desc: [Пробежка] Пока действует Пробежка, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u0423\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Плевок друга] Применение Волшебной метки к неотмеченному врагу повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=4|4}% на 2 с.

\u0423\u044e\u0442.card_desc: [Волшебный барьер] Пока действует Волшебный барьер, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=40|40} ед. в секунду.

B\u0142\u0119dny ognik.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

B\u0142ogos\u0142awie\u0144stwo natury.card_desc: [Splunięcie chowańca] Wytwarza {scale=0.2|0.2}% naładowania arcyzdolności za każdego nieoznakowanego wroga, na którego nakładasz Magiczny znak.

Bum bum.card_desc: [Broń] Wybuch Magicznego znaku zadaje obrażenia wszystkim wrogom w zasięgu 15 jedn. od ofiary.

Chybot.card_desc: [Trucht] Zmniejsza odnoszone przez ciebie obrażenia o {scale=6|6}% podczas używania Truchtu.

Czmychni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Trucht] Skraca czas odnowienia Truchtu o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

G\u0119sty las.card_desc: [Splunięcie chowańca] Wydłuża czas trwania Magicznych znaków o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Harmonia.card_desc: [Magiczna bariera] Otrzymanie trafienia przy aktywnej Magicznej barierze przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Klakson.card_desc: [Trucht] Użycie Truchtu wytwarza chmurę, która przez 3 s przywraca sojusznikom 600 PZ w ciągu 3 s.

Migotanie.card_desc: [Magiczna bariera] Skraca czas odnowienia Magicznej bariery o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Pob\u0142ysk.card_desc: [Magiczna bariera] Otrzymanie trafienia w trakcie trwania aktywności Magicznej bariery zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s.

Poranny oddech.card_desc: [Splunięcie chowańca] Nałożenie Magicznego znaku na nieoznaczonego wroga zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=4|4}% na 2 s.

Przek\u0105ski wielozadaniowe.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zabici przez ciebie gracze upuszczają pakunki zdrowia, które po podniesieniu przywracają ci 800 PZ.

Przytulno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Magiczna bariera] Przywraca ci {scale=40|40} PZ co 1 s podczas trwania Magicznej bariery.

Puchaty.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Radosny.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają twoje aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Sygna\u0142.card_desc: [Trucht] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po użyciu Truchtu.

Symbioza.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane przez ciebie leczenie o {scale=10|10}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Tupot.card_desc: [Trucht] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} w czasie trwania Truchtu.

Wi\u0119ksze dobro.card_desc: [Splunięcie chowańca] Zapewnia {scale=8|8}% kradzieży życia przeciw wrogom z maksymalną liczbą Magicznych znaków.

Bam G\u00fcm.card_desc: [Silah] Sihirli İşareti patlatınca, kurbanın 15 birim etrafında olan tüm düşmanlar hasar alır.

Bo\u015f Hayaller.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

\u00c7erezlik Sald\u0131r\u0131.card_desc: [Zırh] Katlettiğin oyuncular zemine, aldığın zaman seni 800 Can İyileştiren bir paket bırakırlar.

\u00c7o\u011funlu\u011fun \u0130yili\u01.card_desc: [Dost Tükürüğü] Maksimum sayıdaki Sihirli İşaret ile düşmanlara karşı %{scale=8|8} Can Çalma kazan.

Do\u011fan\u0131n Kutsamas\u0131.card_desc: [Dost Tükürüğü] İşaretlenmemiş her düşmana uyguladığın Sihirli İşaret için Ultini %{scale=0.2|0.2} doldur.

Duman.card_desc: [Tabanları Yağla] Tabanları Yağla 3sn duran bir bulut oluşturarak içindeki müttefikleri 3 saniyede 600 Can iyileştirir.

Durma Ka\u00e7.card_desc: [Tabanları Yağla] Tabanları Yağla'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Enerjik.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Evimde Gibiyim.card_desc: [Sihirli Bariyer] Sihirli Bariyer etkinken her 1 saniyede {scale=40|40} Can iyileş.

I\u015f\u0131lt\u0131l\u0131.card_desc: [Sihirli Bariyer] Sihirli Bariyer etkinken vurulduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

Ko\u015fu\u015ftur.card_desc: [Tabanları Yağla] Tabanları Yağla sırasında {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

P\u0131t.card_desc: [Tabanları Yağla] Tabanları Yağla kullandıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

Sabah Nefesi.card_desc: [Dost Tükürüğü] İşaretlenmemiş bir düşmana bir Sihirli İşaret uyguladıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=4|4} artır.

Sarsak.card_desc: [Tabanları Yağla] Tabanları Yağla kullanırken aldığın hasarı %{scale=6|6} azalt.

Simbiyotik.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=10|10} artır.

Uyumlu.card_desc: [Sihirli Bariyer] Sihirli Bariyer'in etkin olduğunda vurulursan {scale=100|100} Can İyileşirsin.

Yanar D\u00f6ner.card_desc: [Sihirli Bariyer] Sihirli Bariyer'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.
